roleset.name: describe roughly

example.name: transitive
example.text: The MiniScribe report outlines a host of allegedly fraudulent practices, including the shipment of bricks and defective disk drives that were booked as sales, and inventory forgeries in accounting records.
example.arg: a host of allegedly fraudulent practices, including the shipment of bricks and defective disk drives that were booked as sales, and inventory forgeries in accounting records.

roleset.note: OUTLINE-V NOTES: Might also take 'listener' arg, but probably not. Location of outlineis ArgM. (from outline.01-v)
